clues.text: In 1901 this inventor received the first radio signal across the Atlantic

clues.response: Men Are from Mars, Women Are from Venus

clues.text: Generally yellow or orange, it's transferred from flower to flower by wind, birds & insects

Term for herrings that were split & cured by salting, drying & smoking

rounds.text: Since the Norman Conquest, this royal house has supplied the most rulers, beginning with Henry II
